description: This file is the main entry point for a React-based frontend application. It imports React libraries, stylesheet files, and the main App component, then renders the App component into the DOM.
published: default export of App component if applicable, but not directly exported here

methods.name: ReactDOM.createRoot
methods.description: Creates a root to manage rendering of React components into the DOM.

methods.name: root.render
methods.description: Renders the React component tree into the specified DOM node.
